page.description: Allows an application to be imported from a .zip file

entry.value: $("body").append("<iframe id='importIFrame' name='importIFrame' width='0' height='0' style='width:0;height:0;border:0px hidden 'fff;' onload='Event_reusable_P9(this);'></iframe>");
.html("<form id='form' method='post' target='importIFrame' enctype='multipart/form-data'><input type='file' id='file' name='file'></input></form>");
